price: 91. Eddcluk ken yallitte fan sissikuk kelli iyyeeh (malgiyeh) matakmaanaa? iyye keenil anqasak.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
